title.narrative: Participatory Conservation of Environ. and Sustainability of Community Based Nature Tourism for Community better life in Mwanga and Same

description.narrative: The overall goal of the project is to contribute towards the longterm conservation of environment and tourist attractions so as to enhance the sustainability of Community based Nature Tourism. The main objectives of the activities are: to reduce environme ntal degradation in Mwanga and Same Districts, conserve and improve fragile local tourist attractions, enhance community based nature tourism, improve service production and hospitality ethic among the community. Despite successful implementation of the pr oject aimed at establishing and promoting community based nature tourism in 2013/14 the District is facing the critical challenge of high rate of environmental degradation including the decline of unique natural tourist attractions thus needing immediate solution. large parts of beautiful scenery are nearly to decline due to human activities and climate change. Thus the project aims at addressing all these problems through capacity building on different crosscutting issues which include, Environmnetal cons ervation community based nature tourism service production and hospitality as well as entrepreneur skills. Building community capacities will build a sense of empowerment passion and they can run their own tourism business and conserve environment.. The pr oject will promote alternative income generation activities like handcraft for women and youth tree nursery establishment and tree planting establishment of beekeeping apiaries sustainable biomass charcoaling cage and pond fish farming.. The project will r estore fragile Ecosystems for Nature Based Tourism, market and promote local tourist attractions products and services. Other activities to be implemented include, mapping attractions through Geographical Position System (GPS), design and distributing prom otional materials, connecting Mwanga District with Mkomazi National Park and Tsavo National Park and formulation of village nature based tourism committees.The target group in this project is local community in villages youth groups in secondary schools w omen entrepreneurs and fisher folks. The expected outcome of the project are reduced environmental degradation increased number of tourists increased income and employment opportunities among the community enhanced community based nature increased investm ent opportunities by local entrepreneurs as well developed inter and intra-cultural relations and networking in Mwanga and Same Districts.
